name: AlienAfterlife
description: Aliens terrorists have stolen the machine to reincarnate you. Go get it back.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or higher Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core 2.4Ghz Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 Storage: 2 GB available space
